cs:emailTemplate.cs:htmlContent:
Graph run ${run.id} of ${sandbox.code} / ${run.jobFile} aborted

runId: ${run.id}

s3: ${S3BUCKETNAME}

DB: ${DB_NAME}

User: ${run.user.username}

Result: ${run.status}

Started: ${run.startTime}

Finished: ${run.stopTime}

#if( ${run.errNode} )

Error node: $!{run.errNode}

#end #if( ${run.errMessage} )

Error message: $!{run.errMessage}

#end #if( ${run.errException} ) 
Error exception: $!{run.errException}
#end #if( ${task.addGraphLog} && ${run.logLocation})

Adding log file: ${run.logLocation}

#end #if( ${task.addGraphLog} && not ${run.logLocation})

Log file not available.

#end #if (${run.trackingGraph}) #foreach ($phase in $run.trackingGraph.trackingPhases) #foreach ($node in $phase.trackingNodes) #foreach ($port in $node.trackingPorts) #end #end #end
phase: ${phase.phaseNum}${phase.executionTime} ms
${node.nodeName}${node.result}
${port.type}:${port.index}${port.totalBytes} ${port.totalRecords} rows
#end
cs:emailTemplate.cs:name: graph finished
cs:emailTemplate.cs:subject: CloverDX Server notification - ${sandbox.name} - Graph run ${run.id} of ${run.jobFile} aborted

${port.type}:${port.index}${port.totalBytes} ${port.totalRecords} rows
#end
cs:emailTemplate.cs:name: graph finished
cs:emailTemplate.cs:subject: CloverDX Server notification - ${sandbox.name} - Graph run ${run.id} of ${run.jobFile} failure
